SEO_TITLE: Somma Plaza Ñuñoa | Apartments in Santiago, Metropolitan Region
SEO_DESCRIPTION: Discover a new concept of living in apartments designed to inspire. At SOMMA Asturias, we offer brand-new apartments for rent, located in Ñuñoa, Santiago, Chile.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_1: Discover a new rental concept that will be the best choice to enhance your life.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_2: In our building exclusively for tenants, you'll be part of a unique community, surrounded by incredible first-class communal spaces.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_3: Our apartments are equipped with appliances and feature excellent finishes, ensuring comfort and functionality. Additionally, we ensure your experience is smooth and secure.
